page.title: 04FARMING AT EARL STERNDALE
page.content: There are twenty farms in our block, all of which have good grassland.They are in three categories:{Beefstock, {Sheep and Dairy.}There are eight farms with{Sheep,}eleven farms with{Dairy} and sixteen farms with{Beef.}Three farms have one of these,Seven have two and six have three kinds. The farmers use machinery to get hay and silage from their fields.They store it for fodder in the winter.We have no arable farmland in our block.The poorest land is on the hill tops and steep slopes.
